pages.text: $(o)The corpse of an alien; the discovery of a century! The consoles were, oddly enough, written in a language similar enough to your own. From what you've gathered, this tall fluffy visitor calls itself a my'ri.$(br)The consoles listed advice for techniques beyond your imagination; something akin to magic! You need to learn more...even if that means butchering a corpse.

pages.name: My'ri Corpse
pages.text: $(o)Oddly mutilated, it doesn't look like these cadavers were naturally sourced...

My'ri corpses can be found in $(l:minebound:structures/crashed_ship)crashed ships$() and $(l:minebound:structures/ruined_base)ruined bases$(). Breaking them yield $(l:minebound:items/myri_manasac)myri manasacs$() and $(l:minebound:items/myri_chunk)chunks of my'ri$(), two pivotal ingredients in creating both spell modules as well as myrial armor.
